title: How gaming the system cost Verstappen in Saudi Arabian GP
summary: Max Verstappen lost his chance of winning the Saudi Arabian GP after being penalised for his Turn 1 incident. But would he have stayed on track given him a chance of winning or was it all lost at the start?Mark Hughesanalyses the Jeddah race

qa_pairs.question: What was the main reason for Max Verstappen's penalty during the Saudi Arabian GP?
wrong_options: Causing a collision with another driver.

qa_pairs.question: In which city is the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix held?
What impact did the penalty have on Verstappen's race outcome?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It cost him a chance to win the race.
wrong_options: It had no impact on his race strategy.
It allowed him to pit earlier.
